constraints.description: General partnership requires at least two partners
Limited partnership requires at least one general partner and one silent partner
Sole proprietorship has full personal liability with all assets
Limited liability company has corporate tax rate of 20%
Business registration costs approximately 70 € for sole proprietorship
Limited liability company requires general meeting and board of directors
Share capital in limited liability company can be 0 €
Partnership profits distributed according to partnership agreement
Owners of limited liability company receive funds as salary or dividends

metadata.title: Comparison: Business Forms and Taxation 2025
metadata.description: Guide comparing different business forms and their taxation implications
